section.name: Service for loading resources in the applications

subsection.name: Objectives
subsection.p: Lutece provides a base implementation for internal services to applcations, allowing them to load their resources. For example , the calendar plugin manages agendas and has an AgendaService service which enables it to load resources, in this case from agenda by means of an identfier.
The aims of this base implementation called Resource Service are to provide :

ul.li: An abstraction layer as long as the loading strategy od resources. These resources can be loaded from files, database etc.. Each loading strategy refers to an implementation of a ResourceLoader. It is possible to combine many loading strategies.
An integrated cache to optimize resource access. The cache of each service can be administered from the Cache Management feature of Lutece.
Configuration facilities of the service (name, cache activation, ... ) based upon property files.
